avalancheActivity.comment: On January 3rd, the snowplow in Bláfjöll pushed a cornice which triggered a small slab avalanche.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted in warm weather the last few days. Little snow is left in the area and the avalanche danger low.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It warmed up significantly in all elevations on Sunday and has been warm since. Snow has subsided and melted. Snow has decreased in mountains and is presumably homogeneous and stable. The avalanche danger is considered low.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow has settlet and melted alot in repeated melt-freeze cycles the last days. The stability is estimated good most places
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow has settlet and melted alot in repeated melt-freeze cycles the last days. The stability is estimated good most places

weatherForecast.highlights: Rigning seinnipart fimmtudags, hlýtt og sunnanátt. Styttir upp á föstudag, vestanátt. Kólnar á laugardagskvöld.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few wet avalanches released in Kirkjubólshlíð in Skutulsfjörður on January 2nd.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted in warm weather the last few days. Little snow is left in the area and the avalanche danger low.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It warmed up significantly in all elevations on Sunday and has been warm since. Snow has subsided and melted. Now, there is rather little snow left in the area and it is wet and presumably homogeneous and stable. The avalanche danger is considered low.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow has settlet and melted alot in repeated melt-freeze cycles the last days. The stability is estimated good most places
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow has settlet and melted alot in repeated melt-freeze cycles the last days. The stability is estimated good most places

weatherForecast.highlights: Rigning um tíma á fimmtudag, hlýtt og sunnanátt. Vestanátt á föstudag og úrkomulítið. Kólnar á laugardag með austanátt, úrkomulítið.

avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has been settling in repeated melt-freeze cycles and is estimated stable. Wind slabs might form in the western part on Thursday night in SW-snowfall

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow has settlet and melted alot in repeated melt-freeze cycles the last days. The stability is estimated good most places
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow has settlet and melted alot in repeated melt-freeze cycles the last days. The stability is estimated good most places

weatherForecast.highlights: SV-læg átt og kólnar á fimmtudagskvöld með snjókomu til fjalla og snýst í V-lægari átt

avalancheActivity.comment: Slab avalanches released in Lambeyrardalur above Eskifjörður and Bagall in of Norðfjörður on Monday, January 8th. The same day, multiple rather small loose avalanches released in the area. A few dry slab avalanches released in SW aspects in Eskifjörður and Fagridalur the night before January 5th. Wet avalanches released many places in the forecasting area in the thaw January 1st and 2nd.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather and partly melted away. Snow should have become rather stable in the lower parts of slopes. In the highest mountains, weaknesses can still exist.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It got warm up to mountain tops on Sunday and Monday and then, snow subsided and partly melted. Multiple avalanches released during this temperature change. While it is still warm, small wet avalanches might release. In the highest mountains, where the effect of the thaw has been less, there is more snow and a possibility for a deeper weakness. At these high elevations, avalanches can become large if they release.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snow has settlet and melted alot in repeated melt-freeze cycles the last days. The stability is estimated good most places
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snow has settlet and melted alot in repeated melt-freeze cycles the last days. The stability is estimated good most places

weatherForecast.highlights: Úrkomulítið næstu daga. Hlýtt á fimmtudag en kólnar seinnipart föstudags. Talsvert frost á laugardag.
